凝聚成一团巨大的黑暗斑块 Condensing into a massive dark blot

从一具肿胀僵尸的腹部涌出 Flowing from the belly of a bloated Zombie

围绕着一只抽搐的盲蛇 Surrounding a twitching Caecilla
